name: Super Totem
description:
# Description

2x speed for crops, trees, fruits, cooking & minerals. Lasts for 7 days

### Contributor

Sunflower Land is a community game built by a hundreds of developers and artists across the globe.
Come join us on [Github](https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land)

attributes.trait_type: Cooking, Crop, Fruit, Tree and Mineral Time
